title: Selected file is invalid or corrupted
content:
The capsule installation fails and you may come across any one of the following error messages:

  1. Selected file is invalid or corrupted, please select a valid content to install
  2. Selected file doesn't contain a valid content manifest, please select a valid content to install

Causes

  1. The first error occurs if the selected capsule file isn't a zip file.
  2. The second occurs if the manifest file isn't present inside the capsule zip.

Solution

 Select a valid capsule file to install.
